shadow.name: OPPRESSION
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Oppression, expressing through oppression

gift.name: TRANSMUTATION
gift.description: The gift frequency of Oppression, expressing through transmutation

siddhi.name: TRANSFIGURATION
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Oppression, expressing through transfiguration

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 47 shadow frequency. The oppression you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural transmutation. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from oppression to transmutation.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your ajna. Notice the sensation of oppression.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 47 consciously for 7 days, the oppression pattern will shift toward transmutation.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 47 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from oppression toward transmutation
